name: facenet
description: Solve face verification, recognition and clustering problems: a TensorFlow backed FaceNet implementation for Node.js.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:python3 && npm run clean:models
scripts.dist: npm run clean:dist && tsc && shx cp src/python3/*.py dist/src/python3/
scripts.doc:
npm run dist && echo '# Facenet v'$(jq -r .version package.json)' Documentation
' > docs/index.md && jsdoc2md dist/src/{facenet.js,face.js,} >> docs/index.md
scripts.lint: npm run lint:es && npm run lint:ts
scripts.lint:backup: npm run lint:es && npm run lint:ts && npm run lint:py
scripts.lint:py: . python3/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH='src/:python3/facenet/src/' pylint --contextmanager-decorators=contextlib.contextmanager,tf_contextlib.contextmanager src/python3/*.py && npm run lint:flake8 && npm run lint:mypy
scripts.postinstall: shx rm -fr node_modules/npm && npm run venv && npm run postinstall:facenet && npm run postinstall:models
scripts.postinstall:facenet: cd python3 && if [ -d facenet ]; then (cd facenet && git pull); else git clone https://github.com/huan/python-facenet.git facenet; fi && cd -
scripts.postinstall:models: set -e && if [ ! -d models ]; then mkdir models; fi && cd models && if [ ! -e model.tar.bz2 -a ! -e model-*.meta ]; then curl --silent --location --output model.tar.bz2.tmp https://github.com/huan/node-facenet/releases/download/v0.1.9/model-20170512.tar.bz2; mv model.tar.bz2.tmp model.tar.bz2; fi && if [ ! -f model-*.meta ]; then tar jxvf model.tar.bz2; rm -f model.tar.bz2; fi && cd -
scripts.start: echo `npm run demo` to show a demo.
scripts.test: npm run check-version && npm run lint && npm run test:py && npm run test:ts
scripts.venv: python3 -m venv python3 && . python3/bin/activate && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && pip3 install --upgrade numpy >/dev/stdout

author: Huan LI <zixia@zixia.net>
